sources.title: The Ex | Full Movie | Mystery Horror
sources.description:
There is no doubt - social media affects our lives, and each action has its consequences. It's been several years since a teenager posted a photo of his girlfriend on the Internet, hoping to brag to his friends about it. Nothing to spoil his happy careless adult life, but the Internet remembers everything. When a chain of mystical events destroys his dream life, his fiancée receives a series of frightful messages that turn her life into a nightmare.
2021.  Stars: Konstantin Beloshapka, Sergey Dvoynikov, Pavel Golubev

metadata.Plot: In Manhattan, Sofia's an attorney and Tom's a cook who has a hard time holding a job. When their first child is born, they agree that she'll be a full-time mom and he'll get a promotion. When he gets fired, he takes a job in Ohio working at the ad agency where her father is assistant director. Tom's assigned to report to Chip, a competitive, hard-driving guy who's in a wheelchair and who's Sofia's ex-boyfriend - from high school. Chip still carries a torch for her, so he connives to make Tom's work life miserable. As Tom's frustrations mount, it may be that Sofia will take Chip's side. Is Tom doomed to fail yet again?
metadata.Actors: Zach Braff, Amanda Peet, Charles Grodin
